full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD THAR PAR 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD THAR PAR 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG DANG SMAN BLA GRVA TSANG THUN MONG BA'I SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI DPAL BZANG PO'I RGYUN DU ZHAL 'DON LA CHO GA CHA LAG TSANG BA LA DGONGS SHING, LHAG PAR TSE 'DAS DGE SNYEN MA TSE RING DPAL MO'I YAR 'DREN GYI PHYIR DU DMIGS NAS 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES BKA' NAN CHE BAR PHEBS PA LTAR LAM 'DI LA MOS PA'I BLO CAN SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS @006B SMRA BA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING GZHAN, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI YA KHU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD PAS 'PHAGS YUL TU BHA WA ZHES 'BOD CING, RGYA NAG GI YUL GRUR ZU'I ZHES GRAGS PA DNGOS PO ZHES SHING PHO KHYI LO'I HOR ZLA DANG PO PHYI MA'I BCU DGU LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
